statements: DELETE FROM nuclear_power_plant_regulatory_filings WHERE filing_type = 'Renewal' AND status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM nuclear_power_plant_regulatory_filings WHERE filing_id = 123 AND status = 'pending';
DELETE FROM nuclear_power_plant_regulatory_filings WHERE filing_type = 'Renewal' AND filing_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM regulatory_filings WHERE filing_id = 100 AND plant_id = 1;
DELETE FROM compliance_documents WHERE plant_id = 2 AND expiration_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM plant_information WHERE plant_name = 'Solar Power Plant';
DELETE FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'Safety Report';
DELETE FROM filings WHERE filing_type = 'Annual Report';
